subject: [Mhln] pills come round shaped with crisscross scores on them no additional charges will be placed Melissa
body:
I never think of the future. It comes soon enough.

In helping others, we shall help ourselves, for whatever good we give out completes the circle and comes back to us.

For economist the real world is often a special case.

Peak performers see the ability to manage change as a necessity in fulfilling their missions.

Since we cannot get what we like, let us like what we can get.

Change alone is unchanging.

Fashion is the science of appearance, and it inspires one with the desire to seem rather than to be.

A cynic can chill and dishearten with a single word.

The real actor has a direct line to the collective heart.

You are the only person on earth who can use your ability.

The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.

The books that everybody admires are those that nobody reads.

The highest happiness of man is to have probed what is knowable and quietly to revere what is unknowable.
